Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

Description : -
"Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood" is an anime series adapted from Hiromu Arakawa's manga. The story follows two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, who use alchemy in their quest to restore their bodies after a failed attempt to bring their mother back to life. The brothers embark on a journey to uncover the Philosopher's Stone, encountering political intrigue, moral dilemmas, and powerful adversaries.
